website_summaries.verdict: A powerful cordless vacuum that can tackle high-traffic areas with ease and offers plenty of features without breaking the bank.
pros: Features DuoClean technology that can pick up both fine dust and large debris
Works on carpet and hard flooring
Converts to a handheld vac with a 40 min
cons: Doesn’t have lights to make cleaning easier

customer_reviews.title: WORKS VERY WELL
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Shark X40 for a little over a month and so far so good. The vacuum seems powerful enough for both our hardwood floors and carpeted one. It is easily converted to a hand held mode and easily emptied. Best of all it's light and cordless.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G. Koukol

customer_reviews.title: Unboxed a dirty product
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use this upon opening the box and finding a dirty and scratched up product. I understand that it’s refurbished but dirty as well? See photos
customer_reviews.author: UncleRya

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refurbished unit. Arrived like new condition. I would make this purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Shark vacuum cleaner for $80. as an Amazon refurbished unit. It's my first battery powered cleaner and I am pleased with the suction power, the floor attachment is great for hard surface floors and does a respectable job on the one carpeted(Berber style) floor I have. The furniture attachment is a simple smooth flair tool and it comes with a crevice tool. If I have any complaint it would be the high frequency noise emitted in use.
customer_reviews.author: rkw

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Adequate power for daily cleaning (lots of bird seed, too) on mostly hardwood and vinyl floors. We've noticed it has a bit of a problem with torn paper, requiring stopping and clearing the rollers. But for lightweight cleaning, we're happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Long John Sliver

customer_reviews.title: It's almost fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a handy, quick way to tidy up, and I find myself doing a whole room. When you engage the rug mode, better be ready to get pulled around. A very powerful tool that almost replaces the full sized machines. We looked at other, more expensive brands, and this clearly was better value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TerryS

customer_reviews.title: Crap company and vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Defective!! Doesn’t work at all and they won’t replace it, the battery or charger!! Don’t waste your time!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac M. Coutre

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: Wireless system works well. Plenty of battery time to get the job done. The power head locks up when I don't want it to.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS D GRIFFITH

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum,  great price
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. I was broke and did some research and bought an off brand cordless vacuum. It was terrible and wouldn't pick up anything. I visited my daughter and used her new Dyson cordless and it was so great, I was determined to use my birthday gift cards to get a new vacuum. This worked as good, or better, than her Dyson. Easy to attach base directly to the handle on order to vacuum my couch. Suction is great and picks up dog hair wonderfully. I'm more than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for a great deal love it battery last about a hour and never have to plug a vacuum in can switch it from carpet to hard wood with a push of a button love the vacuum has some blemishes on it scuffs but it is renewed works great well worth $100 if you buy it new it is &299 so who cares about a little blemish when the performance is spot on will buy again if I ever need another one
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Michelle Amburgey

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: While this vacuum is great for hardwood and ideal since its cordless, the brush roller collects hair constantly and requires it to be cut out every 4-5 times. I would not use this to replace my corded upright and primarily use this on hardwood floors as the polishing roller makes the floors look awesome with little effort!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kulp

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight cordless vacuum, picks up everything, even cat litter! Get in the habit of laying it down if you're not holding it, it will fall easily if you prop it against the wall, it is top heavy. Arrived quickly, well packaged and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This Cleaner Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who has three small children. There’s lots to clean up in that house every day, from crumbs to Play-Doh. She tells me that she really likes this cleaner. I’d say that’s a good testimonial.
customer_reviews.author: E.G. Notargiacomo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: This Shark vacuum came packaged as if were a new product. The vacuum also looks like new except for a couple of minor, almost unnoticeable, rub marks. Suction was impressive and then I turned on the "ion boost." Remarkable. Came with attachments and owners manual. I highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Bond

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight cordless vaccum!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum stairs and it works great. I've always been a fan of shark vacuums as they give a lot of value for the money and this one does not disappoint. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my mom and she loves them. They are very light and the suction on them is great on hardwood or thick carpet. The charge on these stays for a long while which makes them even better.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: Has lost suction
customer_reviews.text: After a limited amount of use this item has lost all suction. Very disappointed. The roller bar still collects hair, on it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Promise V.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vacuum. Works best when pushing forward. Back pull doesn't seem to work as well. I've ran the vacuum over a floor where I thought there wasn't much dirt and ended up with a full canister. (I do have shedding dogs)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy to have this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: When I looked for reviews I saw some people wrought a bad feedback they made me confused but after I bought it and tried it. It’s really good worked perfectly, not heavy like other vacuum . Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Fatito

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying a reconditioned product online. But this vacuum cleaner turned out to be in very good condition and it works great. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge
customer_reviews.text: Battery was not able to charge. It work for a few time and I tried to contact the seller to send me a new battery but they did not send me one. I had to get a new Shark Rock Pro from Sam Club. If you're looking to buy from this site I would not suggest it. Seller does not offer to compensate me for the battery. Now this is sitting in my garage not working at all. The battery does not even charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for so long and I absolutely love it! Great suction, and easy to charge and use.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Andrecht

customer_reviews.title: It's a Shark - never  disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely convenient. Best vacuum I've ever owned. Easy on all floors, upholstery, corners and normally hard-to-reach areas. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! *Keanu voice*
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished but can't tell at all.... No knicks or dings anywhere. Battery seems to be great after the first charge. No issues cleaning cat litter, hair, etc. from hardwood floors and light carpet. Don't be discouraged about refurb.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Harr

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Did lots of research before deciding upon cordless vac purchase. This one is serious bang for buck. Used primarily in bathroom and kitchen daily. Came with only one battery though. I was expecting two.
customer_reviews.author: A.Thoughtful Pen

customer_reviews.title: best vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I used to dread vacuuming but now it is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a solid product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction power. Easy to clean and easy to use. 1 star reduction for the product's weight. Build quality is great, but just a tad heavy. Otherwise a great product and good value.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Lost suction just after return period!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of months then lost suction.
customer_reviews.author: Renee JK

customer_reviews.title: battery dead after 60 days
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum because it had great reviews. It work good for about 60 days, then the charger was not charging. Im not sure if it was the charger ot the vacuum. can't return it or get another battery. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: araceli becker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But this if you’re looking for cordless vacuum for small living areas. Wouldn’t recommend for large areas as the debris bin fills up fast. Captures talcum powder size dust and dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well but a little too heavy and hard to pull apart to empty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, well worth the money for light duty work!
customer_reviews.text: Our main dislike is that it won’t stand on its own, when not in use it has to be propped up against something or it will fall over. Other than that no complaints whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: MarkS

customer_reviews.title: Great daily vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day. Excellent machine. For a deeper clean we use the shark apex duo every week.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This little shark is really great! I am a Dyson girl but took a shot on this for our office and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean , A lot of power for a battery operated vacuum cleaner, battery holds power 👍
customer_reviews.author: nenad

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great value and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: The dual rollers are a great improvement over just one. I’m happy with the purchase. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Has great  suction for a battery operated sweeper.
customer_reviews.text: Can not stand by itself with battery attached. Great on stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, we hardly ever get the big dyson out.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Keller

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and woot are the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shark cordless Ion x40 vacuum as a renewed product and you would think I bought it as a new unit! My wife was pleasantly surprised!!Works Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Randy H.

customer_reviews.title: Battery won’t recharge after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few months then the battery wouldn’t recharge. It is no longer useable at all.
customer_reviews.author: D Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Refurb unit works great and is very handy and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets clogged easily
customer_reviews.text: Has to be cleaned out constantly. Clogs every time I use it!😢
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie & Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive cordless vacuum with excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum - got it refurbished for less than $100. Completely worth it in my small row house. I've got a combination of area rugs and wood floors, and it picks up great on both surfaces - including dog hair from my extra-sheddy short-haired dog. The only downside is that it does not have a lot of different attachments - for example, no small attachments for stairs. But it is light and works great. Battery life is fantastic - I charged it up and the initial charge lasted six weeks of use - using it a couple times a week on area rugs or wood floors. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A.

customer_reviews.title: "Whatadeal"
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Had a Dyson for years but it broke. This on is easy, light and has great power for all needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Van Haastrecht

customer_reviews.title: works good easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, very maneuverable. Handy for quick cleanups too. Attachments for hard to reach or the interior of the car.. And most of all NO CORD. Have a built in whole house vacuum for heavy jobs, but this is my go to quick cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: This vaccum lost suction with 2 months thought it was the charge or filters changed them out and recharged the battery still wont suck anything up have had it for 5 months but the charger was missing for 3 of the 5 so I am unable to return it now learned a valuable lesson about product warranty will not but refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: Sucks really well!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is just as.good as.my plugin Shark navigator. The charge lasts me up to 2 days, but I have 2 babies amd I'm constantly cleaning. I'm very happy with this purchase and recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Aila

customer_reviews.title: RUN... DONT BOTHER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed, I threw the box after I opened it because I have always had great experiences with Shark products, this thing doesnt suction anything, is too heavy on the hand, it's just a disgrace... this was a very expensive mistake
customer_reviews.author: Murderous Crow

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this! I whip it out for so many little cleanings as well as overall carpet cleaning. It's lightweight, easy to empty and charges fast. My new favorite toy!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. White

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I don’t have to lug it around depending on a plug wires always get in my way very lightweight easy to use will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Antonio R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and the features are well designed and easy to use. It hold its charge well and has indicators for how much charge is left.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and gentle on floors.
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for hardwoods. Amazing how much it finds and picks up. You don’t realize how much dust and hair is lurking on the floor until you vacuum with this Shark.
customer_reviews.author: I H

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my carpet, tile and hardwood floors. Battery lasts awhile, I was impressed. Seller is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phearson

customer_reviews.title: Value-price
customer_reviews.text: Very good-I have other shark cordless vacs and this one has less suction-Works great for what I purchased it for- wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Very handy. Easy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.text: Working just fine for what purpose I both it for.
customer_reviews.author: R. ONE.

customer_reviews.title: Good for light cleaning
customer_reviews.text: receptacle for dirt is a bit small-especially for dog hair:-/
customer_reviews.author: picky

product_meta.title: Shark IR141 ION X40 Bagless Lightweight Cordless Vacuum with ION Power Mode, DuoClean, Handheld Mode for Carpet & Hardfloor Cleaning, Black (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Quickly clean up small messes with the Shark IR141 ION X40 Ultra Light Cordless Stick Vacuum. This cordless stick vacuum features a 2-in-1 design that allows you to clean in classic upright mode or detach for above-floor cleaning. You can either step on the floor nozzle release button and pull the wand up to disconnect or you can press the wand release button on the top of the wand to disconnect. Smart Response Technology makes it easy to switch between floor types and suction settings. To use ION boost mode for increased suction for high-traffic areas and heavy messes, all you have to do is press the ION BOOST button. DuoClean Technology traps both fine dust and large debris on all types of floors so you get a deep clean. With a bagless design that's easy to maintain and 3 different charging options, this ION X40 Ultra Light Cordless Stick Vacuum from Shark makes it easy to keep your home clean.
feature_bullets: POWER MODE: Up to 40 minutes of runtime in handheld vacuum power mode. Includes a removable battery, which can be charged in or out of the cordless vacuum. Charge your ION Power Pack inside the vacuum, by itself, or in available charging accessories
FEATURES: The bagless design has a 0.1-gallon dust cup for debris and dirt with Smart Response technology to make it easy to switch between floor types

DEEP-CLEANS CARPETS: Shark DuoClean is equipped with two brushrolls to provide fine dust and large debris cleaning on carpets and hard floors with one powerhead. Use ION boost mode for increased suction for high-traffic areas and heavy messes
TRANSFORMS TO A HAND VACUUM: Use the 8.6-inch wide vacuum mode or switch to a lightweight handheld vacuum with the push of a button and use included attachments for versatile cleaning above the floor
INCLUDES: Shark ION IR141, Charger, ION Power Pack battery, 8-inch crevice tool, and upholstery tool. The vacuum weighs only 8.7 pounds and the dimensions are (L x W x H): 13.4 x 10.2 x 45.9 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
